literature.title: Deep Learning Approaches for Natural Language Processing
literature.abstract: This paper explores various deep learning techniques used in natural language processing tasks such as sentiment analysis, text classification, and machine translation.

literature.title: Introduction to Machine Learning
literature.abstract: This book provides a comprehensive introduction to machine learning algorithms and their applications in various domains.

literature.title: The Impact of Climate Change on Biodiversity
literature.abstract: This article discusses the effects of climate change on biodiversity, including shifts in species distributions, loss of habitats, and extinction risks.
